title: Do you have plastic ready-meal tubs, trays or pots?? reuse them!

title: Find empty plastic bottles and create two vases (pots)
description: Recycle in a creative way using plastic bottles as pots. Re-using these items in new ways will help to reduce your plastic footprint

title: Clean plastic food recipients before trashing them
description: This will help the recycling process

title: Use Only 2 plastic items products for today

title: Do not use plastic straws
description: Try not to use plastic straws. Obviously this will help the environment
